Name: dOrg
Tagline: Top web3 developers delivering decentralized infra and apps on demand. Helping clients reach +$4B TVL
Short Pitch: dOrg is a pioneering Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO) that has been operating as a builders' collective since 2019, revolutionizing how Web3 development teams organize and deliver value. As one of the first successful DAOs in the development space, dOrg operates as a distributed team of top-tier Web3 developers who specialize in creating real-world impact through decentralized technology. What sets dOrg apart is their unique organizational structure—clients aren't just hiring a traditional agency; they're partnering with a collective of passionate builders who understand the Web3 ethos from the ground up. With contributions to projects boasting a combined Total Value Locked (TVL) exceeding $4 billion, dOrg has established itself as a trusted partner for high-stakes Web3 initiatives across DeFi, governance, and decentralized infrastructure.

Services Provided.title: Smart Contracts & Tokenomics
Services Provided.describe: Secure, efficient smart contract development and sustainable token economy design, including governance tokens, utility tokens, and complex DeFi protocols.

Services Provided.title: Web3 & Cross-Chain Integrations
Services Provided.describe: Seamless blockchain connectivity across ecosystems (EVM, Substrate, Cosmos, L2s), enabling interoperability and composability for multi-chain applications.

Services Provided.title: Full-Stack Engineering
Services Provided.describe: End-to-end development including frontend, backend, DevOps, CI/CD, and infrastructure optimization—built for performance and scale in decentralized environments.

Services Provided.title: AI x Web3 Development
Services Provided.describe: Integrate AI with Web3 to build intelligent agents, zkML workflows, smart contract automation, and next-generation decentralized applications.

Services Provided.title: DAO Tooling & Governance
Services Provided.describe: Launch and grow decentralized organizations with robust DAO frameworks, contributor management systems, and sophisticated governance mechanisms.

Services Provided.title: Game Theory & Incentive Design
Services Provided.describe: Model and implement effective incentive structures to drive participation, sustainability, and user alignment in token economies and decentralized systems.

Name: OQTACORE
Tagline: Swiss-based experts in cross-domain innovation: turning bold ideas into scalable realities with precision
Short Pitch: Headquartered in Lausanne, Switzerland, OQTACORE operates at the convergence of AI, Web3, biotech, and enterprise systems. As a deep tech powerhouse, we combine Swiss engineering precision with a global innovation mindset, turning bold ideas into scalable realities with speed and precision. Our approach blends deep consulting insights with robust engineering execution, making us the ideal partner for early-stage innovation through to large-scale deployment. We don't just code—we consult, architect, design, build, and iterate, following our philosophy: Prototype. Pivot. Scale.

Services Provided.title: AI & Intelligent Automation
Services Provided.describe: Design and deploy intelligent AI agents, digital transformation solutions, and process automation systems that streamline operations and enhance decision-making.

Services Provided.title: Blockchain & Web3 Development
Services Provided.describe: End-to-end Web3 solutions including smart contract development, security audits, custom blockchain integrations, and decentralized application engineering across multiple protocols.

Services Provided.title: Biotech & Life Sciences Innovation
Services Provided.describe: Specialized research platform development, digital health prototyping, HIPAA-compliant data pipelines, and medtech tools with full regulatory compliance support.

Services Provided.title: Enterprise Systems & Cloud Infrastructure
Services Provided.describe: Comprehensive systems development, cloud migration strategies, infrastructure management, and enterprise-grade security and compliance solutions.

Services Provided.title: Big Data Engineering & Migration
Services Provided.describe: Advanced data processing pipelines, migration strategies, and analytics platforms designed to handle complex datasets with optimal performance.

Services Provided.title: Strategic Consulting & Design
Services Provided.describe: Technical strategy and advisory services, seamless API integrations, UI/UX design, and usability testing to ensure your solutions meet both technical and user requirements.

Pitch Deck: Sent separately in the chat (Web3 Brochure)

Name: SubQuery Professional Services
Tagline: Bespoke, results-driven data solutions to help you deliver and scale
Short Pitch: Let the experts do the hard work. SubQuery has a team of talented engineers and data-scientists in the field of Web3 data indexing. They know exactly how to build large Web3 datasets that can be used to power rich data-driven applications. SubQuery Professional Services has a proven track record working alongside OnFinality to build and run production datasets and pipelines for the largest teams in Web3.  Why do you need SubQuery Professional Services?  Use our expertise to build an indexer and free up your critical developer resources. Focus on building your project while we help you run the  infrastructure.

Services Provided.title: End-to-end Development
Services Provided.describe: Support all the way from ideation to building and managing your production datasets and pipelines.

Services Provided.title: Indexing Project Reviews
Services Provided.describe: SubQuery can review your data indexing projects to offer improvements and ensure best practices are followed.

Services Provided.title: Optimization & Fine Tuning
Services Provided.describe: Performance optimization to get the most out of your SubQuery indexers.

Services Provided.title: Multi-Chain Expansion
Services Provided.describe: Scale your project across multiple chains with seamless cross-chain indexing solutions built for growth.

Services Provided.title: Migration & Integration
Services Provided.describe: Seamlessly integrate SubQuery datasets with your existing systems or migrate data from The Graph or other indexing solutions.

Services Provided.title: AI & Natural Language Interfaces
Services Provided.describe: Unlock your data with AI-powered tools like the SubQuery GraphQL Agent, which lets users query indexed datasets in plain English - making insights more accessible than ever.
